RelatedSentence: The India Pavilion at the 67th Cannes Film Festival organised by the information and broadcasting ministry has been a big draw over the past three days , the co-organisers Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry ( FICCI ) said Monday .

RelatedSentence: At the inauguration , Bimal Julka , secretary , Information and Broadcasting , said co-production agreements have been signed with countries like the UK , Canada , Germany , Brazil , Italy , Spain , Poland and New Zealand .
It would be now possible for filmmakers of different countries to come together and make films under bilateral co-production agreements .
